text:
Earnin | Palo Alto / Cincinnati, OH | IT, Engineering, Data, Mobile, Marketing, Product | ONSITE, FULL-TIME | https://www.earnin.com

At Earnin, we’re making money work in a way that’s good for everyone. Together with our customers, we’re creating a future based on what’s possible rather than the way it’s always been done. That’s why we let people get paid when they want.

The pay cycle was built for a time when everything was done manually. Now, we can move money at the touch of a button. So, why wait? If we stand together, we can transform how money works. If we help each other, we’ll all succeed.

Our stack: - C# - Python - SQL - Angular - AWS

For more info check out the official postings: https://www.earnin.com/jobs

Or message me directly at with any questions marco.fatica@earnin.com
